extensionDescription.message: Vizualno poudari nadrejeno/podrejeno gnezdenje DOM, ko miškin kazalec premaknete nad elemente na spletni strani.

statusOn.message: Aktivno — premaknite miškin kazalec nad elemente

statusOff.description: Status text when the extension is disabled.

parentDepth.description: Setting to control how many parent levels to highlight.

colorScheme.description: Setting to select the color scheme.
